name: Pacemaker Paradise
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming: James Neild

3D Artist: Daniel Hardy

-------------------------------------------------------------------

This was for the mini jam 2021. Though this game is not so graphicly pleasing as some games. This is the first time i made AI for my game as well as using the unity navmesh system. My friend mad alot more models for this game than seen in the demo, I aim to implement a more full fleshed out version after the jam, for now I hope you enjoy it!

Key mechanics:

You have a 1 minute timer till your pacemaker fails and kills you, collect scrap and then apply it to your pacemaker to extend your lifespan!!

P.s The character models are from mixamo.com

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Controls;

-Left Mouse = move around (point and click)

-Right Mouse = to interact/ attack
